rows.label: tlk43320341_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I don't have much sympathy for
them, since they led us astray
and tried to bring us low.

rows.label: tlk43320341_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But it's also thanks to
them that we have so many
Drivers around these days.

rows.label: tlk43320341_04_msg0004
rows.name:
So future generations will
have to get used to having
a lot less Drivers around.

rows.label: tlk43320341_04_msg0005
rows.name:
And the Superbians will have a
major advantage, with all their
Divine Beast weaponry, too.

rows.label: tlk43320341_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, for as long as their Divine
Beast stays alive, that is.
